page.title: 11RECREATION AT SAMLESBURY SCH
page.content: At playtime we play on the playground and on the field when it is dry. Games have their seasons and, suddenly, every one starts something new. On the field, we play football and a sort of rugby.In the summer we have races and swingball. During Wimbledon fortnight tennis is popular. If we cannot go on the field,we play Hopscotch, Ball tag, Poison Pot and Rats and Rabbits. Our favourite game is British Bulldogs. One person carries another on his back and you try to attack other pairs. It is exciting and a bit rough. The younger children play with some dolls called "My little pony". They also play families with the girls. We do things like picnics and family out- ings. We usually have lots of kids and they are very mischievous.
